metadata.synopsis: The goblins have been narrowly beaten. From on top of the tall front gate, Zevlor shouts down to us, then to someone relatively on his level to open the gate.

1.speaker: Zevlor
1.text: That was the last of them. Inside - all of you. More may follow.
1.context: NodeContext: Shouted down to us - at the bottom of the gate

0.speaker: Zevlor
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Zevlor calls for gate to open (custom camera)NodeContext: Calling out o someone standing on his level, but not extremely close.
